unnormalised: PayTM-achem aatantle chukenne netizens-ank hasoun soddta! Distta, tanchi "instant cashback" offer zaiti *khari* instant nasli ji advertise kel'li. Users tankam tem godd, godd Rs. 50 off aplya chai ani samosa orders-ancher (total bill: ₹150, lagbhag.) report kortat ki Bollywood lagna poros vell lagta.
normalised: PayTM-achem navin fuskenn netizen-ank hanso yeta! Dislem, tanchem "instant cashback" offer zaitench instant naslem zoxem sanglam. Users je chai ani samosa order-acher to godd, godd rupiya pannaas kami korunk sodtat (total bill: rupiya dedhso, sumarak) tankam Bollywood logn-am porosui vell lagta oxem report kortat.
text: PayTM-achem aatantle chukenne netizens-ank hasoun soddta! Distta, tanchi "instant cashback" offer zaiti *khari* instant nasli ji advertise kel'li. Users tankam tem godd, godd Rs. 50 off aplya chai ani samosa orders-ancher (total bill: ₹150, lagbhag.) report kortat ki Bollywood lagna poros vell lagta.

unnormalised: Dishta, dil'lem "5 sekundachim cashback" mhunttlear "5 vevsaai divsanchem cashback" zaun asa, jachi result mhunn hasyachem memes ani tweets utponn zatat. Ek kullanıcı uzzo korun mhonnla, "Mhajya putraanche putr zalea uprant mhaka cashback mellonk xakta mhunn dista mhaka hem samosa sompaychea adim. Azun Rs. 20 mellonk asa zachem vachon dila!". PayTM'cho stock dar? Sodyak Rs. 850 alrededor asa. Hem karan asunk xakta kai?
normalised: दिसता म्हणल्यार, "पांच सेकंदांचो कॅशबॅक" म्हणिल्लो तो "पांच वेवसायीक दिसांचो कॅशबॅक" जावन गेला, ताका लागून मजेदार मीम्स आनी ट्विट्स तयार जाल्यात. एका वापरकर्त्यान थट्टा करून म्हणलें, "म्हज्या परज्याक नातूंक हांवें हो सामोसो सोंपोवचे पयलींच कॅशबॅक मेळटलो. म्हाका दितात म्हणिल्ले वीस रुपयांची अजून वाट पळेवन आसा!". पेटीमचो स्टॉक भाव? सध्या आठशें पन्नास रुपयांच्या आसपास घोवत आसा. हें कारण आसूं येता?
text: Dishta, dil'lem "5 sekundachim cashback" mhunttlear "5 vevsaai divsanchem cashback" zaun asa, jachi result mhunn hasyachem memes ani tweets utponn zatat. Ek kullanıcı uzzo korun mhonnla, "Mhajya putraanche putr zalea uprant mhaka cashback mellonk xakta mhunn dista mhaka hem samosa sompaychea adim. Azun Rs. 20 mellonk asa zachem vachon dila!". PayTM'cho stock dar? Sodyak Rs. 850 alrededor asa. Hem karan asunk xakta kai?

unnormalised: PayTM-an ek nivedon zaree keleam ani teanchea sevan khatir tankam "adiviteey maagani" asa mhunn sanglam. Adiviteey, vo fakt anapekshit dhimi? Aami anuman kortanv ki tancheancho customer support ragist grahkanchea ₹50 port kor mhunn mangnneancho maar झेलता. Hea gati-n tankam 'ushir zal’lea cashback' ₹100 divpak zatat, fakt shaanti sambhallunk!
normalised: PayTM-an ek statment dilem ani te mhunntat tankam tankanchya service-ak “unprecedented demand” asa. Unprecedented, vo fokot unexpectedly slow? Amchea andazan tankanchya customer support-ak ragar zal'le customer-anchi zambhir laglea tankam tankanche rupee ponchass parat zai mhunn. Hea rate-an, tankam ‘delayed cashback’ cashback dilear puro, torui rupee ekxem dilear shaanti asteli!
text: PayTM-an ek nivedon zaree keleam ani teanchea sevan khatir tankam "adiviteey maagani" asa mhunn sanglam. Adiviteey, vo fakt anapekshit dhimi? Aami anuman kortanv ki tancheancho customer support ragist grahkanchea ₹50 port kor mhunn mangnneancho maar झेलता.
